bibl.title: Fragments of Six Newly Identified Greek Bible Manuscripts in a Cambridge Collection: A Preliminary Report.
bibl.note: Collection of small pieces of vellum purchased early in 2003 by a private collector from a London dealer.

bibl.title: TC: A Journal of Biblical Textual Criticism

bibl.seg: HEAD Peter M., Fragments of Six Newly Identified Greek Bible Manuscripts in a Cambridge Collection: A Preliminary Report.
TC: A Journal of Biblical Textual Criticism 8 (2003) <http://rosetta.reltech.org/TC/vol08/Head2003.html>.
Collection of small pieces of vellum purchased early in 2003 by a private collector from a London dealer.
